name: Popular 3 LMS Supported
description: Most popular 3 LMS plugins Tutor, LearnDash & LearnPress supported with highly customizable Courses, Units, Lessons, and Quizzes.

name: 1-Click Demo Import
description: A very handy feature which is added to the edubin theme, you can import any of the demos of live preview in only one click

name: Elementor Page Builder
description: Elementor for WordPress is drag and drop frontend and backend page builder plugin that will save you time working on the site content.

name: Custom Builder Element
description: Creating gorgeous pages quickly and easily without any coding skills. Edubin has 30 + custom elements with third-party popular plugins base elements.

name: Powerful Theme Options
description: Use Theme Options to change and customize all areas of your site, without touching the code.

name: Google Fonts
description: We provide free support our customers. Ask your questions or Submit a ticket to see additional support options.
